text:
WILLIAMS COLLEGE
WILLIAMSTOWN. MASSACHUSETTS
OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT
JUL 2 3 1956
* »A IK
“d A
Mr. Harold E. Hill
Associate Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mr. Hill:
This is to acknowledge the receipt of your
letter of July 17th addressed to President Baxter.
Mr. Baxter is referring your letter to
Dean Roy Lamson for reply. Mr. Lamson is at present in
California but when he returns to Williamstown at the
end of next month, your letter will be brought to his
attention .
Secretary to the President.
